title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the dimly lit chamber, a gleaming revolver rests on the worn wooden table, its cold steel gleaming ominously. The handle, wrapped in faded leather, tells stories of past confrontations and daring escapes. With a smooth pull of the trigger, the weapon responds with a satisfying click, echoing through the silence. Ammo is scarce, making each shot precious, each decision critical. As tension mounts, the air thickens with anticipation. This revolver, an emblem of resolve and danger, could be the key to survival or the harbinger of chaos. Choose wisely, for every action has consequences in this treacherous game.
